","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A plan helps to give you ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"clarity","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" about your values and goals — the life you want to lead. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It provides a ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"sense of control","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" over your finances, and the knowledge that you won’t have to carry on working for longer than you need to. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"And it gives you ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"peace of mind","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" that, whatever happens, you will have enough money to maintain your chosen lifestyle. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"£2,950","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":", or ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"£3,950","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" for couples, we will provide you with a comprehensive financial plan.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"

","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The planning process","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The process includes six two-hour video meetings, in which we help you identify what you want to achieve; assess the current state of your finances and the potential challenges you face; design a detailed plan to achieve your objectives; and finally, help you to execute your plan.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"

","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Annual reviews","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"But financial planning is an organic process; your circumstances will change, and so must your plan. We therefore recommend a one-hour review every year. If you need to consult your planner in the meantime, you can simply book a meeting.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our hourly charge is ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"£200","marks":[{"type":"italic"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":", and you only pay for assistance as and when you need it.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"


","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"IMPORTANT","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Please note, although we sometimes refer our clients to regulated financial advisers, we are not a regulated advice firm ourselves.
